attributes.title: Terrible app

This is app is terrible and it needs so much work that it‚Äôs probably not even worth it. I would just delete the app entirely if I could.

attributes.review: Much like trump and his campaigns, this app is one of the most disgusting, least productive, pieces of trash I have ever used. We will not be silenced, and we will continue to fight.

attributes.review: this is app is a disgrace to the AppStore i can‚Äôt help but hold some sort of detest against apple for not banning this garbage yet. let‚Äôs start with the fact that the app itself took a week to download, after the fact my phone began to crash spermatically. after being lucky enough to get my iPhone under control long enough for me to DELETE the app i received a phone call from my bank telling me my card information had been compromised. also this app gave me HIV.
attributes.title: if i could leave -5 stars best believe i WOULD

attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of getting some cool merch, but then, all of a sudden, my phone starts blasting the star spangled banner at me. I throw the phone down in fear, and something straight out of a horror movie, the phone starts scrolling itself. It goes to his twitter page where it reveals all the misogynistic, xenophobic, and racist comments he‚Äôs made (oh god it was A LONG list, this guy is highkey intolerant as hell). Then my phone started smoking. I believe Chump owes me a brand new IPhone for my troubles, and a box full of MAGA hats so I can burn every last one one of them.
attributes.title: Uh oh. Stinky.

attributes.review: The minute I opened this app, it crashed immediately. Every other app I tried to open would crash as well, and it's embarrassing that our president would let such an app do these things to our devices and still go unnoticed. I was quick to delete the app from my cell phone, but it continues to act buggy. The performance of this app is at the lowest quality, and I do not believe it should continue being on this App store and ruining other fine people's devices.
attributes.title: Awful quality. ü§¨

attributes.review: This Application is completely horrific. First of all, it took me around three hours in order to download. Next I was bombarded by all these ads and propaganda against Democrats, Which completely destroys my opinions on politics. Despite being a Trump supporter I am disappointed in the way this app is designed and presented to the public. This is a threat to our society but also our nation as a whole. I hope Apple remove this from the App Store and sets boundaries to prevent horrible apps like this from being on the market.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrfic ü§¨
